synopsis.text: Fuji Asako, a captivating yet hot-tempered elementary school teacher, finds herself in an unexpected rivalry with her student, the spirited and persistent Chitose. Chitose, an 11-year-old girl with a heart full of determination, is smitten by the older and charming town hall worker, Hiroshi. As Chitose tirelessly chases after Hiroshi's affection, the unconventional love triangle unfolds, leading to a series of humorous and heartwarming escapades. Will Chitose's unwavering pursuit ever bear fruit, or will Hiroshi remain oblivious to her affections? Only time will tell in this delightful tale of young love and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
